For more information about how we handle your personal data, please refer to our Privacy Policy Accept Home Canoeing Skydiving Bungee Contacts Skydive with EpicVenture for an Unmatched Adventure in the Indian Sky Feel the Thrill of Skydiving Over India's Breathtaking Views Skydiving with EpicVenture offers you the unique opportunity to break free from the ordinary and take a leap into the extraordinary. Feel the rush of the wind, the freedom of the sky, and the adrenaline pumping through your veins as you dive from the heavens. Cost from $550. You can find out more details and place an order using the following link: Order The Thrill of Free Fall Our skydiving experiences are designed to offer both novices and seasoned thrill-seekers the adventure of a lifetime. With state-of-the-art equipment and expert instructors, you are in safe hands as you experience the exhilaration of free fall over some of India's most breathtaking landscapes. Why Skydive with EpicVenture? Exhilarating Heights: Jump from up to 15,000 feet for a truly epic skydiving experience. Safety First: Our certified and experienced instructors guide you through every step, ensuring the highest safety standards. Captivating Views: From the aerial view of the majestic Himalayas to the panoramic sights of the coastline, each jump offers a new perspective on India's diverse beauty. Your Skydiving Journey Tandem Jumps: Perfect for beginners, tandem jumps allow you to experience skydiving securely attached to a professional instructor. Solo Jumps: For experienced skydivers, we offer solo jumps, allowing you to enjoy the sky at your own pace. Photography Services: Capture your skydiving moments with our photography services, so you can relive the thrill again and again. Touch the Sky with EpicVenture Skydiving is not just a sport, it's a transformative experience. It's about overcoming fears, pushing boundaries, and experiencing life from a new height. Cost from $550. You can find out more details and place an order using the following link: Order At EpicVenture, we invite you to step out of your comfort zone, spread your wings, and discover the freedom of flight. Are you ready to touch the sky? Discover India's ultimate adventure playground with EpicVenture! Glide through the tranquil rivers, embrace the gentle caress of the sun, and witness nature's splendor up close. Cost from $350. You can find out more details and place an order using the following link: Order The Journey Awaits Our canoeing adventures take you through some of India's most picturesque landscapes. From the lush backwaters of Kerala to the expansive beauty of the Brahmaputra, each route is carefully selected for its unique beauty and serenity. Why Choose Canoeing with EpicVenture? Tranquil Routes: Paddle at your own pace, find peace in the gentle flow of the rivers, and soak in the stunning scenery. Eco-Friendly Adventure: Experience the joy of traveling through nature with the smallest ecological footprint, preserving the pristine beauty of our waterways. Family Friendly: A perfect activity for all ages, our canoe trips are designed to cater to both beginners and experienced paddlers. Your Canoe, Your Adventure Solo or Group Journeys: Whether you want a solitary escape or an adventure with friends and family, we have the right canoe experience for you. Guided Trips: Our expert guides will lead you through the best routes, sharing stories of the land and ensuring a safe journey. All-Inclusive Experience: From high-quality equipment to safety gear, we provide everything you need for a hassle-free canoeing adventure. Discover the Hidden Treasures of India Canoeing with EpicVenture is not just about the journey; it's about the discoveries you make along the way. For more information about how we handle your personal data, please refer to our Privacy Policy Accept Home Canoeing Skydiving Bungee Contacts Privacy Policy Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms") carefully before using the EpicVenture Outdoor website ("Website") operated by EpicVenture Outdoor ("EpicVenture," "Company," "we," "us," or "our"). These Terms establish a legally binding agreement between you ("User," "you," or "your") and EpicVenture Outdoor regarding your use of the Website. Information Collection and Use We may collect personal information from you when you voluntarily submit it through forms, surveys, or when you contact us directly. The types of personal information we may collect include your name, email address, phone number, and any other details you provide. We use this information to respond to your inquiries, provide support, process orders, and offer a personalized experience on the Website. Additionally, we may use your information to send promotional messages or newsletters, but you can opt out of these communications at any time. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on the Website. Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device by a web server. They collect certain information about your browsing activities and preferences on the Website. These cookies enable us to analyze website traffic, personalize content, and improve our services. By using the Website, you consent to the use of cookies and tracking technologies. You have the option to modify your browser settings to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent. However, please note that some features of the Website may not function properly if you disable cookies. Data Sharing and Disclosure We may share your personal information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating the Website and managing our business. These service providers are contractually obligated to maintain the confidentiality and security of your personal data. We may also disclose personal information if required by law, in response to a valid legal request, to protect our rights, or to investigate fraudulent or illegal activities. Data Security We take precautions to protect your personal information and ensure that it is treated securely. However, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage method is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data, but we implement and maintain reasonable security measures to safeguard your personal information. Third-Party Websites The EpicVenture Outdoor website may contain links to third-party websites that are not operated by us. Once you leave our Website, we have no control over the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any websites you visit. Children's Privacy The EpicVenture Outdoor Website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under the age of 13, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes we make will be posted on this page, and the effective date of the policy will be updated. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.
